XIV.4.B.1.g
.
Transporting FTI
Employees transporting FTI between a primary location to a secondary location (i.e., building to building) need to secure the FTI in a locked security container during transport.
Note
:Â  The transporting and receiving location must log the FTI in accordance with
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.B.2.j
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section B - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match: Safeguarding
